text: Ezɨ no, nɨ Godɨn gumazimra, nɨ bizir kurar kaba akɨrim ragh dagh asaragh. Egh nɨ arazir aghuibar amuva, egh guizɨn Godɨn araziba iniva, egh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨva, egh igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim ikɨva, egh arazir tugha gavgavigha osɨmtɨziba bar da ateramim ikɨva, egh gumazibar asughasughamin arazim ikɨ. Nɨ arazir kaba bar pamtem dar suiragh dar gɨn mangɨ.
